name: Snecca: Winding Snake
description:
A puzzle game twist on the snake formula where you break the most fundamental rule of snake... that I'd like to explore more!

Move with WASD, progress turns without moving with SPACE.

Undo with LSHIFT or RSHIFT. 

Please comment if you need a hint... not too good at balancing. Every level is possible in quite few steps, however.

---

I had so many more ideas for this, but I'm glad that my initial idea was solid enough and my urge to resist overscoping solid enough to finally sort of finish something according to something that even resmbled my initial plan! 

Character-tracking turrets, more snake tail-types, and more might come later, but I'm glad with my nice implementation of the undo mechanic, struggles with the 3-color limit, and time management in general.

Thanks for playing, and be sure to leave your games in the comment for me to play as well!
